property.name: description
property.value: The base port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. SilverFabric will increment at runtime to avoid conflicts.

property.name: description
property.value: The base port the job tracker server will listen on. SilverFabric will increment at runtime to avoid conflicts.

property.name: description
property.value: The base port the job tracker JMX server. SilverFabric will increment at runtime to avoid conflicts.
